articles.title: Liam Hemsworth is Geralt in the first Witcher season 4 trailer
articles.description: Itâ€™s been a few years since Netflix confirmed that Liam Hemsworth would be taking over as Geralt of Rivia in the live-action Witcher series. And while we caught a brief glimpse of him in action last year, the first proper clip from season 4 of the show reveals just how Hemsworth will be inhabiting the […]
articles.author: Andrew Webster
